import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function RegistrarDashboard() { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (

ðŸ“‹ Registrar Dashboard

Welcome, Registrar. Manage case assignments, schedule hearings, and oversee user accounts.

{/* Case Assignments */} ðŸ“‚ Case Assignments Assign cases to judges and prosecutors for processing. {/* Hearing Management */} ðŸ“… Hearing Management Schedule, reschedule, and manage hearings for ongoing cases. {/* User Accounts */} ðŸ‘¤ User Accounts Create, update, or deactivate user accounts for civilians, prosecutors, judges, and registrars. {/* Reports */} ðŸ“Š Reports Generate system reports on case loads, assignments, and hearings. ); }
